message.entry: First argument must be a table or a numeric matrix.
Specify the ''GroupVariable'' using a parameter name and value pair.
Parent container must be a figure, uipanel, or uitab.
Parent container is a deleted graphics object.
Data must be a numeric matrix.
''CoordinateData'' must be a vector with valid indices into the Data columns.
''GroupData'' must be a vector with the same number of rows as ''Data''.
''GroupData'' must be a cell array of character vectors.
''Color'' must be a scalar or a vector equal to number of groups in ''GroupData''.
''{0}'' must have the same data type as ''{1}''.
''{0}'' must be a 2 element row vector.
categorical function could not convert the group values to valid category names.

entry.note: {0} is a property name, such as SourceTable

message.entry: Setting the ''{0}'' property after setting the ''Data'' property is not supported.

entry.note: {0} is a property name, such as XData

message.entry: Setting the ''{0}'' property after setting the ''SourceTable'' property is not supported.
